channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12542] Create HiveRelFactories
item.description: Calcite 1.5.0 introduced the use of RelFactories to create the operators. In particular, RelFactories contains the factories for all the operators in the system. Although we can still implement old rules by providing each individual factory (the constructor is deprecated, but it won't be removed till Calcite 2.0.0 is out), new rules will only provide constructors based on RelFactories. Thus, we propose to migrate immediately to the new interface.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

pxiong, I saw that HIVE-11927 introduces HiveRelFactories too, but only some of them. We could check this patch in before, as it includes all the factories in HiveRelFactories. What do you think? Thanks
If you prefer, you can also pick up the code, integrate it there, and I can close this one as duplicate, no problem.
jcamachorodriguez, either way is ok for me. thx
